name: I saw my friend
description:
Warning
Game only for two players how to connect

1st player: write your room name and click "create room"

2nd player: write the same room name and click "connect"

Description

Test your friendship in this challenging game. You can see cool mushrooms and deadly saws here.

Input:
  • move - a d
  • jump - space
  • restart - r
  • drop item - q
  • shoot - lmb
